content.text: The Bothans (pronounced /'bɑθɪn/) were credited with stealing the plans for the Death Star II, despite sustaining heavy casualties, thereby enabling the Rebel Alliance to plan an attack on the unfinished space station.

Though the mention of Bothans in the film Return of the Jedi by Mon Mothma did not expound on the nature of Bothans, their role and sacrifice in securing the plans for the second Death Star is well-known as a consequence.

elements.text: Star Wars: Episode VI Return of the Jedi
